Posts.Content: Hello I am on my 3rd cycle of FEC and have used the cold cap with good success so far. I do find it very uncomfortable but it's worth persevering. I'm feeling a bit crap tonight so it's a short post! I just wanted to encorage you to give it a go.! Suzie x
Posts.Title: Exerience of Epirubicin/EPI and Cold Cap
